sentences.en: a TV sex education series aimed at teenagers
sentences.cn: 一部针对青少年的性教育电视系列片

sentences.en: Above all things, the Chinese teenager is anxious to please his parents.
sentences.cn: 尤要的是, 中国的将屈成年的少年人,都深愿能博得父母的欢心的.

sentences.en: As a teenager he attended Tulse Hill Senior High School.
sentences.cn: 十几岁时，他上了塔尔斯山高中。

sentences.en: Each teenager chooses his own way to spend his free time.
sentences.cn: 每个青年人可自由地选择自己的休闲方式.

sentences.en: He was acting like a lovelorn teenager.
sentences.cn: 他表现得像个害单相思的少年。

sentences.en: He's been working in the tea business since he was a teenager.
sentences.cn: 他十几岁的时候就投身于茶业了.

sentences.en: Parents may find that a troublesome teenager becomes unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 父母会发现令人头疼的青少年变得难以管教。

sentences.en: Sandy is a very busy teenager.
sentences.cn: 山迪是个非常忙碌的少年.

sentences.en: She was a child prodigy, giving concerts before she was a teenager.
sentences.cn: 她是个神童，十来岁不到就举办音乐会了。

sentences.en: Since his parents died early, he had to earn his own living when he was a teenager.
sentences.cn: 因双亲早亡, 他十几岁的时候就不得不独自谋生.

sentences.en: Spots can be the bane of a teenager's life.
sentences.cn: 粉刺会给青少年带来无尽的烦恼。

sentences.en: That teenager singer is really dynamite!
sentences.cn: 那个少年歌手真是轰动一时!

sentences.en: The teenager ran away after being punished.
sentences.cn: 那个少年在受到惩罚后逃走了.

sentences.en: This teenager ran away at the age of fifteen.
sentences.cn: 这名青少年在十五岁时离家出走.

sentences.en: When I was a teenager, I felt that I was just young and uncertain.
sentences.cn: 当我十来岁的时候, 我就感到自己年轻气盛,但是缺少把握.

trans.tran_en: someone who is between 13 and 19 years old
